#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define f first
#define maxn 101000
#define s second
#define ll long long int
#define inf 1000000014
#define infl (ll)(1e18)
#define mod 10000019
using namespace std;
int arr[30];
int dp[30][30];
   int n,m;
int solve(int m,int ind)
{int ans=0;
if(ind>n)
  return 0;
if(ind==n&&m<=arr[ind]) return 1;
if(ind==n&&m>arr[ind])  return 0;
if(dp[m][ind]!=-1)
  return dp[m][ind];
else
  {
  for(int i=0;i<=arr[ind];i++)
  {  if(m<i)break;
    ans+=(dp[m-i][ind+1]=solve(m-i,ind+1));
  }
  //cout<<m<<" "<<i<<ans<<"\n";
  return ans;
  }
}
int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{

   cin>>n>>m;
   for(int i=0;i<30;i++)
   {
    for(int j=0;j<30;j++)
      dp[i][j]=-1;
   }
   for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i)
   {
     cin>>arr[i];
   }
  cout<<solve(m,1);
}
